label: AB2_oP12_61_a_c-002
title: AgF$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
This is a distortion of the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_cF12_225_a_c-001}{fluorite ($C1$) structure}.  We can recover that structure when $a = b = c$ and $x_{2} = y_{2} = z_{2} = 1/2$. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_oP12_61_a_c-001}{$\beta$-HgO$_{2}$}, \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_oP12_61_a_c-002}{AgF$_{2}$}, and \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_oP12_61_a_c-003}{PdSe$_{2}$} have the same AFLOW prototype label, AB2\_oP12\_61\_a\_c. The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
